BAYERN WANT €48M FOR SANCHES

Bayern Munich want €48m for their Portuguese attacking midfielder Renato Sanches.

The Bavarian club’s CEO Karl-Heinz Rummenigge has said Sanches will have limited opportunities if he remains at the club next term, adding Bayern are open to letting the player go out on loan next season.

“He won’t get enough minutes at Bayern, so we’re willing to negotiate a loan deal and maybe beyond that,” Rummenigge said.

“I’m not the coach, but I think Renato needs regular football. I can confirm Milan’s interest, but talks didn’t progress last week.

“If a club are interested in a Bayern player, they must be ready to deal with significant economic figures and I don’t feel that Milan are ready to meet our demands.

“We’ll say that it wouldn’t be bad if a €48m offer came in for him”

BAYERN WANT €48M FOR SANCHES

Bayern Munich want €48m for their Portuguese attacking midfielder Renato Sanches.

The Bavarian club’s CEO Karl-Heinz Rummenigge has said Sanches will have limited opportunities if he remains at the club next term, adding Bayern are open to letting the player go out on loan next season.

“He won’t get enough minutes at Bayern, so we’re willing to negotiate a loan deal and maybe beyond that,” Rummenigge said.

“I’m not the coach, but I think Renato needs regular football. I can confirm Milan’s interest, but talks didn’t progress last week.

“If a club are interested in a Bayern player, they must be ready to deal with significant economic figures and I don’t feel that Milan are ready to meet our demands.

“We’ll say that it wouldn’t be bad if a €48m offer came in for him”

【廠兵入廠】5名阿仙奴球員在上海食物中毒　4人不適1人場上嘔吐 (20:22)

阿仙奴昨晚雖然在上海上演的國際冠軍盃以互射12碼挫拜仁慕尼黑，報卻連續兩季歐聯慘負對方之仇，但領隊雲格賽後證實5個球員食物中毒。

雲格表示早在碰拜仁前，前鋒基奧特便已身體不適，隊長中堅梅迪薩卡則至賽前一刻「頂唔順」決定退賽，至於新兵後衛哥拉辛拿斯是在上半場末段出現嘔吐後，被迫退下火線，而中場艾朗藍斯和前鋒禾確特均在賽後感覺很差，「教授」總結道：「他們全都有點食物中毒的迹象。我們不知原因。」

雲格又提及從涼快的澳洲北上上海後，對這中國城市的酷熱及在36℃氣溫下對陣拜仁「感到有點震驚」，卻又帶點無奈地承認長途跋涉到各地比賽與商機有密切關係，並說：「若你問我這是否有幫球員的體能，我一定會說不。」被問及總有點益處時，他說：「能與世界各地球迷見面，全隊職球員一起生活兩星期，也對彼此有更深了解。」阿仙奴將在周六在北京鬥車路士。
